name: A walk on a zombious day
name_original: A walk on a zombious day
description:
---In development---

---Early access version---

---For keeping up with devlogs follow me on instagram @weido__games--- 

A top-down, side-scrolling shooter game where surviving zombies is the main topic.
There's obviously an endless ammount of zombies for all pleasures.
You can run, you can shoot, you can get eaten by zombies... or maybe you must run for your life, you must shoot to survive and most important... you mustn't get eaten by zombies.
